page.title: 01HURSTBOURNE TARRANT, UPTON
page.content: There are three communities living partly within this block.The villages of{Hurstbourne Tarrant, Ibthorpe}and {Upton.}The land included is owned by six different farmers, and there are two privately owned manor houses. Several of the farmhouses are private homes. {Hurstbourne Tarrant}is the largest community and is built around crossroads of A343 with B3048 and an unclassified road. It lies in a valley at the foot of a very steep hill about 6 miles north of{Andover}in North Hampshire. {Ibthorpe}and{Upton}lie on the unclassified road out of the crossroads.{Ibthorpe}is at the edge of the village, within a mile of the crossroads and{Upton}about 2 miles.
